title: AI Assistant - Chat & Control GMod with AI
description: Talk to an AI that can ACTUALLY control your game! Type '!ai spawn 10 zombies' and watch it happen. 40+ tools: spawn props/NPCs/vehicles, give weapons, change gravity, teleport, and more. Supports local AI (LM Studio/Ollama) and cloud AI (Cerebras - FREE). Includes AI Live companion that follows you and helps in combat!
